price: 126 A Allah appartient tout ce qui se trouve dans les cieux et sur la terre. Sa science embrasse toute chose.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭan
